name: Abandoned_64
description:
Abandoned_64 is a nostalgia inducing platformer from 1996.
To progress through the clearly unfinished levels you have to exploit the bugs and flaws that coincidentally became part of the game. 

The gameplay provides a varied experience with a mix of platforming challenges, brain teasers and narrative.
The game is aimed at players experienced in video games.

If you want to speedrun the game, activate the timer in the main menu options.

Special thanks to Yassine Boutaouas for voice acting.
